channel.title: FullVitality - New outstanding RSPS 317 in development!, worth reading!
channel.description:
Hello there, This may not be as detailed as expected, I just thought i'll make this short and sweet.
Ok, I've been working on a 317 Rsps called FullVitality. Here's is some screens for the latest build. I'm working of a source called Deathlypvp V3, I wouldn't lie saying "Oh, I've made it myself" but i've been editing it and been changing some sprites to suit the servers standard. I will be putting some credits to the owner of Deathlypvp v3 (Hack3r).
This is the homescreen. I've added a little detail to the Login page and have also made a new BG. http://prntscr.com/110jcn
This next photo shows the new Hp bar. http://prntscr.com/110jku
Since this is early development I have not changed much. I will be changing a lot of things before release.
List of what i'm changing: - Changing everysingle sprite. - Add new characters (NPCs) - New home - More commands - Voting system
This is just a small amount of what is ready to come. I'm also in need of a Web-Dev because I suck at making web pages. You have to fit within this criteria:
-Over the age of 16. -Mature -Experianced -Good at making Hompages with chatbox and forum. -I want it to look like a simple SS website (Not that much detailed). The reward would be 50% of the donations and Dev. You may think oh it's only donations. This server will be different making it like soulsplit and getting 100s of donations.
Don't hate.
Thanks for reading - Trot888

trot999:

This server will be different making it like soulsplit and getting 100s of donations.

item.title: FullVitality - New outstanding RSPS 317 in development!, worth reading!
item.dc:creator: @Cruel_Truth Cruel Truth
item.description:
@Cruel_Truth wrote:

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:14, topic:516899”][quote author=Cruel Truth link=topic=635160.msg4289819#msg4289819 date=1367033667]

Yes that source, But it’s going to be changed dramatically (So it doesn’t even look like the source). How is the web-dev a joke?, I don’t want a 10 year old kid.

Age doesn’t matter on how much knowledge you know in a particular programming language.
[/quote]agree and disagree really

you can be 13 and be a programmer but that doesn’t mean your going to understand very complex/advanced programming methods either.

It’s sort of like algebra it will click one day but until then…

Explain that to Arham.[/quote]Arham doesn’t understand very advanced Java material. he understands java but he doesn’t comprehend how to write the advanced portions.

Read full topic
